manifest.name: math-intrinsics
manifest.description: ES Math-related intrinsics and helpers, robustly cached.

scripts.prelint: evalmd README.md && eclint check $(git ls-files | xargs find 2> /dev/null | grep -vE 'node_modules|\.git' | grep -v dist/)
scripts.postversion: auto-changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-edit --amend && git tag -f "v$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)")"

manifest.readme:
# math-intrinsics <sup>[![Version Badge][npm-version-svg]][package-url]</sup>

[![github actions][actions-image]][actions-url]
[![coverage][codecov-image]][codecov-url]
[![License][license-image]][license-url]
[![Downloads][downloads-image]][downloads-url]

[![npm badge][npm-badge-png]][package-url]

ES Math-related intrinsics and helpers, robustly cached.

 - `abs`
 - `floor`
 - `isFinite`
 - `isInteger`
 - `isNaN`
 - `isNegativeZero`
 - `max`
 - `min`
 - `mod`
 - `pow`
 - `round`
 - `sign`
 - `constants/maxArrayLength`
 - `constants/maxSafeInteger`
 - `constants/maxValue`


## Tests
Simply clone the repo, `npm install`, and run `npm test`

## Security

Please email [@ljharb](https://github.com/ljharb) or see https://tidelift.com/security if you have a potential security vulnerability to report.
